summary: Lorecraft plugin for the Sabrecat Gear Mod Pack
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 4.0+[/url]
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12583]Sabre Cat Gear Mod Pack v2.2 by DVAted[/url]

[u]Just a note[/u]
 Lorecraft has issues right now with patch 1.6, so anything I make is probably going to be incompatible. I\'m going to wait for Arcanesmith to update Lorecraft to Skyrim v1.6 before I make any updates. Sorry for the inconvenience but I don\'t want to make a plugin that might cause errors for you guys on 1.6; as of right now any errors you suddenly run into, especially if it\'s only happening right now after 1.6, is likely because of errors from the main Lorecraft mod - for more info go to its page.

Currently, Arcanesmith has not said when an update for 1.6 would happen for Lorecraft.

[center]------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b][u]FEATURES[/u][/b]
6 Lorecraft books made for Lorecraft v4.0+ and the Sabre Cat Gear Mod Pack v2.2
[list]
[*] Heavy Sabrecat Armor
[*] Heavy Snow Sabrecat Armor
[*] Light Sabrecat Armor
[*] Light Snow Sabrecat Armor
[*] Sabrecat Shields
[*] Sabrecat Bows
[*] Sabre Saber
[/list]

[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]
1) Install the Sabre Cat Gear Mod Pack
2) Install this Lorecraft plugin
3) Load this plugin\'s .esp after the Sabre Cat .esp

[b][u]FUTURE CHANGES[/b][/u]
- Will add in the Ancient Nord Sabrecat armors as optional additional plugin
- Will also make a plugin for the Sabrecat Backpacks but most likely as a separate upload

[b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b]
ArcaneSmith for the awesome Lorecraft plugin system!
TreasureChest, DVAted
author: Elementroar
